listing.title: List of tenants
listing.description: Tenants allow you to organise your metrics as soon as they get to the observability service.
listing.description_bis: Using multiple tenants, you can structure your data according to your needs, confidentiality levels, access controls, retention policies, and chosen locations.

delete.delete_tenant_description: Are you sure you want to delete the "{{tenantName}}" tenant?

onboarding.description: Create your new tenant to continue exploring the full potential of observability metrics. You can send data, create dashboards, and configure alerts to suit your specific needs.

creation.title: Create a tenant
creation.descriptionPlaceholder: Add a description of the metrics you plan to track within this tenant

limit.title: Ingestion limit (active metrics)
limit.description: Define the maximum number of active metrics for this tenant.

edition.title: Edit tenant
edition.subtitle: You can create a tenant in your "{{tenantName}}" observability service

unsubscribe.title: Unsubscribe
unsubscribe.warning: If you unsubscribe from the metrics tenant for this resource, data will no longer be collected, permanently, and the associated data will be deleted.
